titles: The true and readie way to learne the Latine tongue attested by three excelently learned and approved authours of three nations, viz. Eilhardus Lubinus, a German, Mr. Richard Carew, of Anthony in Cornwall, the French Lord of Montaigne : presented to the unpartiall, both publick and private considerations fo those that seek the advancement of learning in those nations / by Samuel Hartlib ...
author: Hartlib, Samuel, d. 1662.
publisher: Printed by R. and W. Laybourn ...,
notes: Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
keywords: Latin language --  Study and teaching --  Early works to 1800.
